message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mixed session with mild risk-off in IT and renewables; FMCG and select healthcare outperformed. PSU/industrial names were steady. Several liquid midcaps printed inside-to-positive days, while smallcaps showed dispersion with metals active on volume. Our portfolio closed +2.54%, led by Laurus Labs, LTF and BSE; IDBI and BEL lagged.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "signal": "Risk alert / consider reduce if weakness persists",
      "reason": "Closed below ₹100 after open=high reversal; sellers active. A sustained break below ₹98.8 would invalidate near-term support.",
      "price": 99.26
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "signal": "Add on breakout",
      "reason": "Tight consolidation at highs; consider adding only on strength above today’s high (₹284.45) for continuation.",
      "price": 280.0
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Hold, trail stops",
      "reason": "Momentum continuation with higher close; trail below today’s low (~₹970.6) to lock gains.",
      "price": 983.15
    },
    {
      "symbol": "BHEL",
      "signal": "Hold; add only above strength",
      "reason": "Positive day holding higher lows; consider add only on push above ₹268.4 with volume.",
      "price": 267.25
    },
    {
      "symbol": "DABUR",
      "signal": "Buy on strength",
      "reason": "Expansion candle closing near high with solid volume; trigger above ₹520 with tight risk.",
      "price": 517.05
    },
    {
      "symbol": "AUBANK",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout",
      "reason": "Strong close near day high; breakout trigger above ₹881 for momentum follow-through.",
      "price": 880.3
    },
    {
      "symbol": "CHOLAFIN",
      "signal": "Buy on controlled dip",
      "reason": "Strong up-close after testing highs; look for pullback into ₹1730–1740 for a better entry if strength holds.",
      "price": 1745.9
    },
    {
      "symbol": "JINDALSTEL",
      "signal": "Breakout watch",
      "reason": "Closed strong; continuation setup above ₹1085 with defined risk.",
      "price": 1080.7
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "signal": "High-volume breakout watch",
      "reason": "Heavy volume with price near recent range top; trigger above ₹140.8 for a quick swing.",
      "price": 138.18
    },
    {
      "symbol": "NAVINFLUOR",
      "signal": "Momentum continuation (watch only given price/lot size)",
      "reason": "Large bullish range closing near highs; continuation possible above ₹6099, but unit price is high for our current cash.",
      "price": 6055.0
    },
    {
      "symbol": "CDSL",
      "signal": "Avoid / wait for stabilization",
      "reason": "Sharp intraday fade from highs on notable volume; monitor ₹1530 support before considering longs.",
      "price": 1539.1
    },
    {
      "symbol": "WAAREEENER",
      "signal": "Avoid longs for now",
      "reason": "Lower close with weak tape in renewables; wait for reclaim of ₹3429 and strength confirmation.",
      "price": 3369.6
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "action": "Sell",
      "reason": "Exit on breakdown below key ₹98.8 support to cap downside and free cash.",
      "quantity": 10,
      "price": 98.8
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "action": "Buy",
      "reason": "Only if IDBI stop triggers and price crosses ₹140.8 with momentum; rotate into a liquid, high-volume breakout candidate.",
      "quantity": 12,
      "price": 141.0
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 806.3,
    "total_value": 26620.45,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ ₹2385.00 (CMP ₹2496.60, +4.68%)",
      "LTF: 30 units @ ₹266.26 (CMP ₹280.00, +5.16%)",
      "BEL: 20 units @ ₹419.45 (CMP ₹415.15, -1.03%)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ ₹900.05 (CMP ₹983.15, +9.23%)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ ₹265.49 (CMP ₹267.25, +0.66%)",
      "IDBI: 10 units @ ₹103.80 (CMP ₹99.26, -4.37%)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "AUBANK: Watch breakout > ₹881; close near highs suggests strength.",
    "CHOLAFIN: Strong session; buy-the-dip toward ₹1730–1740 if strength persists.",
    "DABUR: Expansion day; trigger > ₹520 for continuation.",
    "JINDALSTEL: Momentum setup; trigger > ₹1085.",
    "SAIL: High volume; breakout watch > ₹140.8.",
    "NAVINFLUOR: Strong momentum; price heavy for our capital—watch only.",
    "NH: Wide-range up day; constructive above ₹1810.",
    "TATACHEM: Relative strength; monitor follow-through above ₹895.",
    "KPIL: Firm close; momentum improves above ₹1325.",
    "BEL: Pullback; monitor ₹412–414 as near-term support.",
    "IDBI: Sub-₹100 close with supply; use tight risk or exit on breakdown.",
    "CDSL: Distribution-like day; watch ₹1530 for stabilization.",
    "IT basket (PERSISTENT, KPITTECH, COFORGE, TATAELXSI): Soft tape; wait for strength before new longs.",
    "WAAREEENER/NTPCGREEN: Renewables soft; avoid until key levels are reclaimed.",
    "BSE: Cooling after gap; still strong trend—hold while above ₹2489 day low."
  ]
}
